mapper.insert: insert into contest_problem_user(contest_id, problem_id, user_id, problem_number) values (#{contestId}, #{problemId}, #{userId}, #{problemNumber})
mapper.select: select user_id, sum(time_cost) as total_time_cost, count(time_cost) as total_accept, rank() over (order by count(time_cost) desc, sum(time_cost) asc) as `rank` from contest_problem_user where contest_id = #{contestId} group by user_id limit #{startIndex}, #{pageSize}
